trans-unit.source: Manages the subscriptions of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty"></xref> to the owner activities.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> class using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref>.
Fires correlation initialized events.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that owns the correlation token.
A collection of property values in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref>.
<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> was already initialized.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> is initialized.
To initialize the correlation token, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken.Initialize%2A>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> is initialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that owns the correlation token.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that owns the correlation token.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref>.
A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty"></xref> objects.
Subscribes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> to the initialized event.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that owns the correlation token.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationTokenEventArgs"></xref> that is listening for a change in event data.
activity or dataChangeListener are null references ( in Visual Basic).
Unsubscribes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> from the initialized event.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that owns the correlation token.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationTokenEventArgs"></xref> that is listening for a change in event data.
activity or dataChangeListener are null references ( in Visual Basic).
